page = <Page url='https://automationexercise.com/contact_us'>

    def test_contact_us_form(page):
        with allure.step("Navigate to Contact Us"):
            page.goto("https://automationexercise.com")
            page.click("text=Contact Us")
    
        with allure.step("Verify 'GET IN TOUCH' is visible"):
            assert page.locator("text=Get In Touch").is_visible()
    
        with allure.step("Fill contact form"):
            page.fill("input[name='name']", "TymurTest")
            page.fill("input[name='email']", "tymur@example.com")
            page.fill("input[name='subject']", "Feedback")
            page.fill("textarea[name='message']", "Just testing automation.")
            page.set_input_files("input[name='upload_file']", "README.md")
    
        with allure.step("Submit form and verify success"):
            page.click("input[type='submit']")
            page.on("dialog", lambda dialog: dialog.accept())
